item.title: TSI Calculator
item.description: So the other day I was talking to my wife, letting out my frustrations about work and interests. She listened attentively how I ramble about my curiosity for programming and how it could be used (and it’s used) to solve or analyze hydraulic, hydrological and limnological problems.

item.title: Great Expectations: Not Dicken's but client's
item.description: Note: This is my first article. I’m not in mood of making a “welcome, the blog is open” type of post, so instead I’ve decided to discuss some other topic that is interesting me.
